## WorkspaceSvg.getBlockById() method

Find the block on this workspace with the specified ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBlockById(id: string): BlockSvg | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | ID of block to find.  The sought after block, or null if not found. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[BlockSvg](./blockly.blocksvg.md) \| null
